long_description: The women's Tifosi Rumor Interchangeable Sunglasses come with 3 interchangeable pairs of lenses for cycling, running and active sports when the sun is bright or when the clouds roll in. Brown lenses enhance color contrast and are ideal for hiking and mountain biking to view the trail ahead. Multipurpose AC Red lenses are perfect for sunny to cloudy conditions and everything in between. Use the clear lenses in low light, heavy overcast and dusk. Grilamid TR-90 homopolyamide nylon frames offer extremely high bending strength, low density and high resistance to chemical and UV damage.
short_description: The women's Tifosi Rumor Interchangeable Sunglasses come with 3 interchangeable pairs of lenses for cycling, running and active sports when the sun is bright or when the clouds roll in.
